scripts.build: rm -fr build && mkdir -p build && node_modules/.bin/elm-make Main.elm --output=build/app.js
scripts.debug: rm -fr build && mkdir -p build && cp index.html ports.js json2xls.bundle.js build/ && node_modules/.bin/elm-live Main.elm --output=build/app.js --dir=build -- --debug
scripts.live: rm -fr build && mkdir -p build && cp index.html ports.js json2xls.bundle.js build/ && node_modules/.bin/elm-live Main.elm --output=build/app.js --dir=build
scripts.publish-to-gh-pages: npm run build && cp index.html ports.js json2xls.bundle.js build/ && node_modules/.bin/gh-pages --dist build/ && echo 'deployed to https://natim.github.io/elm-json2xls/'
